<!---Cachafla/sc 2655/fix displaying dynamic index in template by @cachafla in [#514](https://github.com/validmind/frontend/pull/514)--->
- **Cachafla/sc 2655/fix displaying dynamic index in template**. - Fixes a template issue where the internal `order` and `index` properties are being exposed to the template editor. These properties don't have an effect when a template is being edited since they are dynamically generated all the time. The fix is to not save these properties back to the template:

<img width="737" alt="image" src="https://github.com/validmind/frontend/assets/21595/7af1aa3f-c2c6-4ab7-8c57-ceef786d668f">


<!---Dark mode by @gtagle in [#494](https://github.com/validmind/frontend/pull/494)--->
- **Dark mode**. All ValidMind users will have the option to set their color theme preference for ValidMind UI with a toggle named "Enable dark mode" under their Profile settings. 
This setting will be saved to the user's profile and remembered wherever they log in from.
